name: ImageHue

description.en: Adjusts the hue of input value by the amount of Offset.

main: vec4 P = mix(vec4(Color.bg, K.wz), vec4(Color.gb, K.xy), step(Color.b, Color.g));
vec4 Q = mix(vec4(P.xyw, Color.r), vec4(Color.r, P.yzx), step(P.x, Color.r));
vec3 hsv = vec3(abs(Q.z + (Q.w - Q.y)/(6.0 * D + E)), D / (Q.x + E), Q.x);
return vec4(hsv.z * mix(K2.xxx, clamp(P2 - K2.xxx, 0.0, 1.0), hsv.y), Color.a);
